original_text: He was trying to see who Jesus was. There was a big crowd there and he was a small man. So he could not see Jesus.
korean_text: 그가 예수께서 어떠한 사람인가 하여 보고자 하되 키가 작고 사람이 많아 할 수 없어

sentences.original_text: He was trying to see who Jesus was
There was a big crowd there
and he was a small man
So he could not see Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 예수를 볼 수 없었습니다
